author: seanoc
msg: Added more exception handling to Dispatch interface
Moved context handling on Dispatch and EndpointInvocationHandler into BindingProviderImpl

author: andreasmyth
msg: Registered shutdown handler to (optionally) attempt to terminate open sequences
by a) sending a standalone LastMessage if no LastMessage had been sent previously
or b) explicitly requesting an acknowledgement
In both cases the acknowledgement that is received in response triggers actual sequence termination if all message have been acknowledged.

author: jiangning-iona
msg: make performance test can work with celtix-1.0-beta
